author: Zevive

changelog.release_notes: Added debugging for elusive iOS bug
Changes in preparation for new features

- Relative Mode for Streak Habits
- Added the option to start a new Streak Habit at an existing streak number
- Fixed a bug that was causing some count responses for past pins to not be recorded correctly
- Fixed a couple of minor bugs

Major release with lots of new features:

* Includes a wide range of fully customisable Habit modes. 
* Allows you to track Streak and Count Habits at any frequency, with presets for Hourly, Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly and Monthly. 
* Enables you to choose custom days of the week for your Habits - no more losing the Streak on weekends! (Most requested feature!)
* Special Advanced modes: Hidden pins, Random reminders, and Read-only reminders.
* Companion Website with statistics and graphs for each Habit, as well as full habit configuration. Manage all of your Habits in one place!
* Third-Party API account access - integrate Habits into your app! (More information: api.my-habits.net)
Using account token to link accounts.
Updated API url to resolve iOS redirect issue.

description:
Introducing My Habits, the Pebble Timeline app designed to help you start and maintain positive Habits. Available as a one-time paid upgrade to Habits, for $2.99 through KiezelPay.

MY HABITS (paid upgrade)

* Includes a wide range of fully customisable Habit modes. 
* Allows you to track Streak and Count Habits at any frequency, with presets for Hourly, Daily, Weekly, Fortnightly and Monthly. 
* Enables you to choose custom days of the week for your Habits - no more losing the Streak on weekends! (Most requested feature!)
* Special Advanced modes: Hidden pins, Random reminders, and Read-only reminders, and Offline support.
* IFTTT Maker Channel integration.
* Companion Website with statistics and graphs for each Habit, as well as full habit configuration. Manage all of your Habits in one place!
* Third-Party API account access - integrate Habits into your app! (More information: api.my-habits.net)
* Integration with Snowy - the well known personal assistant for Pebble Time.

HABITS (free)

* Track Daily and Weekly Streak Habits, with nudges and custom responses.
* Track Daily Count Habits, with Forceful mode and custom responses.
* All of the existing free Habits features are still free!

For more information about My Habits, please visit my-habits.net. Don't forget, if you like My Habits, please give it a ❤️!
title: Habits
